TextView.android:text: THE BEST MEMORIES COME FROM THE CRAZIEST IDEAS
Event consists of 3 rounds and a wild card round.

JUMBLE DUMBLE Arranging yourself according to the given parameters. Different parameter will be given on spot. One who does first among the 4 teams get selected. In total 15 teams get selected for 2nd round.
GET IT THROUGH In this maximum needles and beads are to be put into the thread. It's a time event, after a particular time, no. of needles and beads will be counted.
Wild card entries (SUBWAY SURFERS) It is a game related to our phone game. Eliminated teams will be given a chance. On basis of combined total of a team, one will be selected.
BHAGAM BHAAG Field event related to water and ball.
Entry of two as a team will be entertained.
